1.0.name: wordpress/order-up-custom-post-order
1.0.description:
Order Up!

A series of plugins for WordPress which allow for the ordering of pages, posts, and taxonomies through a simple drag-and-drop interface using the available WordPress scripts and styles. The plugins are extremely lightweight, without a bunch of unnecessary scripts to load into the admin. They also fall in line gracefully with the look and feel of the WordPress interface.
